data.title: AT40 CHR list of stations
data.meta_description: AT40 80s and 70s already has those lists of stations though.  I figured that since at40.com already has list of stations, but confusing part is which ones HAC or CHR?  So why not use a
data.text:
Post by kani on

AT40 80s and 70s already has those lists of stations though. I figured that since at40.com already has list of stations, but confusing part is which ones HAC or CHR? So why not use a separate thread for list of radio stations that chart reflects CHR version. Pulsemusic proboards posts those charts of CHR every week, so you can tell. Also note that some cases lists of tunein display or displaying website lists of station could few cases could be wrong because sometimes site doesn't update the lists.

Here are the list of stations. I'll start with mine first. American Top 40 with Ryan Seacrest (CHR version)

Date of Broadcast and Time of Broadcast (All times Eastern - USA)

Station Call Letters

Station Frequency

Link (to listen online)

Website of station

If a station plays Premiere AT 40 Optional Extras

Friday 8:00PM-12:00AM

CRI (China Radio International) Hit FM (Beijing) - NEVER STOP THE BEAT - Beijing, China

88.7 FM

Listen: tunein.com/radio/CRI-Hit-FM-887-s50390/

streema.com/radios/play/8076?player=external

If tunein nor streema doesn't work, go to main site and click play button to listen live. Otherwise sometimes the stream won't work..

Website: www.hitfm.cn/

Plays Optional Extras: Always, after each optional extra then it would play some extra local songs or go to local china commercial, until next hour starts

Note: There may be some cases that CRI FM listen stream could have some connectivity problems, or taking some time to buffer, like several seconds or a minute.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Saturday 9:00AM-1:00PM (Show REPEATS Sunday at 11AM)

KIIS - Los Angeles, CA

102.7 FM

Listen: www.iheart.com/live/1027-kiis-fm-los-angeles-185/

Website: www.kiisfm.com/main.html

Plays Optional Extras: (sometimes though, but not consistent basis)

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[I'll format it later]

WAKS/Cleveland 96.5 Kiss FM Saturday 6a-10a EST kisscleveland.com

WFLZ/Tampa 93.3 FLZ Saturday 6a-10a EST 933flz.com

WKSL/Jacksonville Saturday 6a-10a EST 979kissfm.com

CKIX Saturday 12:30PM-4:30PM (Canada local time 2PM-6PM) AND repeats Sunday 8:30AM-12:30PM (Canada local time 10:00AM-2:00PM), plays optional extras but not consistent basis

WHYI/Miami Y100 Sunday 7a-11a EST y100.com

WXXL/Orlando XL 106.7 Sunday 7a-11a EST xl1067.com

WYOY Sunday 7AM-11AM EST; AND 9PM-1AM EST

WAKZ/Youngstown 95.9 Kiss FM Sunday 8a-12p 959kissfm.com

WHTZ/New York Z100 Sunday 8a-12p EST z100.com

WKDD/Akron 98.1 WKDD Sunday 8a-12p wkdd.com

WKFS/Cincinnati Kiss 107 Sunday 8a-12p kiss107.com

WKST/Pittsburgh 96.1 Kiss FM Sunday 8a-12p 961kiss.com

WNCI/Columbus 97.9 WNCI Sunday 8a-12p wnci.com

WXKS/Boston Kiss 108 Sunday 8a-12p EST kiss108.com

WBKS Sunday 9AM-1PM, doesn't play optional extras

WZPL Sunday 8PM-12AM, doesn't play optional extras

Everybody else feel free to add those other stations which air AT40 CHR version please.

Post by Mike on

Let me save y'all the trouble.

This is a comprehensive list of the U.S. stations that carry the show, that I've been able to come up with. All times EST.

NOTE: This list is accurate as of mid-April. So it's possible that some things have changed since then. But, it covers the entire weekend.
